main.name: Patrick Skolsky
main.description: Avid cyberspace traveler, immersed in the arts and internet.
main.bio: I am a junior full-stack developer, with experience in the MERN stack.  My focus is primarily in front-end web design, bringing my art and design background to the web!
main.contactmessage: Please, Contact me using the form below.

resume.skillmessage: Front End Web Developer with a BFA in Fine Art and a Certificate in Full Stack Web Development, both from Rutgers University.  Skilled in the MERN stack, as well as Adobe Suite and principles of art and design. Passionate about creating and delivering memorable and functional visual experiences in the world and on the web.

education.description: Full Stack Web Development with a focus on MERN stack. Add more

education.school: Mason Gross School of the Arts at Rutgers University
education.description: Studio practice with concentrations in Painting and Printmaking.  Add more

work.title: title
work.description: Having recently finished my Full Stack WedDev Certificate, I have been further developing my skills with personal projects and freelance work.

work.title: Lead Screen Printer
work.description: Operator of Manual/Automatic screen printing presses in garnment/apparel decoration. I ran the warehouse and production on my own, with direction and oversight of the business owners from a nearby location.

projects.title: Safe Flight
projects.category: One-stop platform for travelers looking to book a flight on an airline that is safe, secure and is not prone to malfunctions.

projects.title: Art Gif Generator
projects.category: Webapp utilizing Giphy API to showcase 'Internet Art' styles

projects.title: SFC Delivery
projects.category: A SMS based convenience store delivery service

testimonials.text: A true visionary.  There is no stopping genius from flowing through this vessel.
Patrick is to Front-End Web Dev, what I am to music.  The greatest. Period.
